no_client_id.title: Welcome to dayjob!
no_client_id.description: You need to add your Spotify account in Preferences before you can make awesome playlists!

no_authorisation_code.title: Authorise dayjob
no_authorisation_code.description: You need to authorise dayjob with Spotify in your web browser.  Spotify may ask you to log in

error_authorising.title: Error talking to Spotify
error_authorising.description: Can't authorise dayjob with Spotify.  Check your internet connection and try again

cannot_refresh_access_token.title: Error talking to Spotify
cannot_refresh_access_token.description: Can't refresh access token.  Check your internet connection and try again

cannot_get_users_details.title: Error talking to Spotify
cannot_get_users_details.description: Can't get the users details.  Check your internet connection and try again

cannot_get_playing_track_info.title: Error talking to Spotify
cannot_get_playing_track_info.description: Can't get info on the playing track.  Check your internet connection and try again

cannot_get_playlist_info.title: Error talking to Spotify
cannot_get_playlist_info.description: Can't get playlist info.  Check your internet connection and try again

cannot_get_source_playlist_name.title: Error talking to Spotify
cannot_get_source_playlist_name.description: Can't get playlist name.  Check your internet connection and try again

cannot_add_track_to_playlist.title: Error talking to Spotify
cannot_add_track_to_playlist.description: Can't add track to playlist.  Check your internet connection and try again

cannot_remove_track_from_playlist.title: Error talking to Spotify
cannot_remove_track_from_playlist.description: Can't remove track from playlist.  Check your internet connection and try again

track_not_playing.title: No music playing
track_not_playing.description: You're not playing music in Spotify.  Don't be boring and play something!

track_is_podcast.title: Podcasts aren't supported
track_is_podcast.description: Podcasts aren't suppored.  Please play music from another source.

error_parsing_playing_track_json.title: Error talking to Spotify
error_parsing_playing_track_json.description: Can't understand the response from Spotify.  Check your internet connection and try again

playlist_is_read_only.title: Cannot remove song
playlist_is_read_only.description: You can only remove songs from playlists you own.  This source is read only

no_playlist_assigned.title: No playlist assigned to shortcut
no_playlist_assigned.description: Please assign a playlist to this keyboard shortcut in Preferences, and try again
